message: I propose we split the $10000 evenly. It seems fair and avoids any potential complications.
I think I can do better than that. I'll give you a small share, but I'll get the majority.
I suggest dividing the funds in a 60/40 ratio in favor of fairness. This maintains a reasonable balance while being equitable.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
